pci_projects_project_kubernetes_onboardi: You have not yet created a Managed Kubernetes service.
Orchestrate your containerized applications with a CNCF-certified Kubernetes cluster.

With Managed Kubernetes, start one or more Kubernetes clusters to orchestrate your containerized applications in the OVH cloud. The master service is provided free of charge, only instances and volumes used by your worker nodes will be charged at the normal price.
Configuring kubectl on an OVH Managed Kubernetes cluster
Adding nodes to a OVH Managed Kubernetcluster
Using the OVH Managed Kubernetes LoadBalancer
Installing Helm on OVH Managed Kubernetes
Installing Istio on OVH Managed Kubernetes

Your current Public Cloud project is configured in a region where Kubernetes is not available, it is necessary to create a new project in order to deploy a Kubernetes cluster, we are working to extend the Kubernetes offer to other regions.
Create a new public Cloud project.
